attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned petition that the 1967 Abortion Act be revoked. The act of abortion destroys the lives of thousands of women every day, not to mention the innocent children, and is reprehensible in all circumstances.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Revoke the 1967 Abortion Act."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page12899.asp

Prime Minister's Office
